short_desc: Referrals, information and support for abused South Asian women and children in abusive and domestic violence situations
description: Toll-free and confidential telephone line. Provides domestic violence support to South Asian women. Support in Bangla, Gujarati, Hindi, Kannada, Malayalam, Marathi, Nepali, Punjabi, Tamil, Telegu and Urdu. Trained advocates and volunteers provide support to women and children in abusive situations. Offers assistance that is nonjudgmental, sympathetic, and culturally sensitive. Narika helps domestic violence survivors with referrals to the following: family law and immigration; individual and family counseling; support groups; social service; shelter; and healthcare providers.
